738140.name: Fantasy Grounds - Tropicana: Gorillaconda (Savage Worlds)
738140.description:
Tropicana: Gorillaconda

LowFy TV Studio is shooting its new monster movie in San Jose, featuring a giant prehistoric gorilla-anaconda hybrid. But on the set things keep going wrong day after day and rumours begin to circulate that the movie is cursed!
An introductory adventure for Tropicana, for 3-6 Novice Heroes or a Startup Agency.
Conversion by Perry Chalmers
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Perry Chalmers
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
